thread.section_title: Influential Women in Politics - Women's Rights and Political Issues - Cosmopolitan
thread.title: 14-Year-Old Keyshaun Mason Murdered

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: 14-Year-Old Keyshaun Mason Murdered
text:
This is terribly tragic news. A Maryland teenager was stabbed to death Monday while defending his mom from her live-in boyfriend, police say. The teenager, 14-year-old Keyshaun Mason, had just started his freshman year of high school, according to NBC's Washington, D.C., affiliate .
The murder reportedly happened Monday morning. Mason's mom and the boyfriend, 48-year-old Sean Crawford, got into an argument, police say. During the argument, Crawford allegedly grabbed a kitchen knife and forced Mason's mom into a bedroom.
 Mason and his 18-year-old brother — ​ who is Crawford's son — ​ got into the bedroom and demanded Crawford leave. Instead, he allegedly stabbed Mason in the chest and his brother in the shoulder. Mason was pronounced dead at the hospital . His brother was treated and released.
Crawford's been charged with first-degree murder and attempted first- and second-degree murder.
One of Mason's friends described him as a "nice kid" who was "friendly with everybody."
"My best friend is gone," 14-year-old Chardonnay More said.​
